3789.verse: By those [angels] lined up in rows

3791.verse: And those who recite the message,

3793.verse: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.

3794.verse: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars

3795.verse: And as protection against every rebellious devil

3796.verse: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,

3797.verse: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment,

3798.verse: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness].

3799.verse: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay.

3800.verse: But you wonder, while they mock,

3801.verse: And when they are reminded, they remember not.

3802.verse: And when they see a sign, they ridicule

3803.verse: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.

3804.verse: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

3806.verse: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."

3807.verse: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.

3808.verse: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."

3809.verse: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."

3810.verse: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship

3811.verse: Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire

3812.verse: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."
